text: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

translation.en: But they who believe and do righteous deeds - those are the companions of Paradise; they will abide therein eternally
translation.id: Dan orang-orang yang beriman dan mengerjakan kebajikan, mereka itu penghuni surga. Mereka kekal di dalamnya
